description: Chicken and veg are tossed in honey, lime, hoisin and ginger to take this chicken stir-fry to the next level. Serve this easy dinner with speedy microwave rice.
keywords: Honey Hoisin Chicken & Veggie Stir-Fry with Rice
name: Honey Hoisin Chicken & Veggie Stir-Fry with Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g Macro free range chicken stir-fry strips

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, cook rice according to packet instructions. Divide rice among plates and top with stir-fry. Scatter with remaining chilli and serve with lime wedges.
